column5: I had lunch with a guy today who indicated there were sturgeon in Pigeon and tri lakes? I am australian as most here know - so felt like I was a sucker on the hook - given Sturgeon lake et al  Does anyone know if there are strugeon in Pigeon, Big Bald or Little bald lakes? or as I iterated am i the sucker who said no way  thankyou and good luck ice fishing this year - i am going to give it a crack (waiting to Feb so I am safe!)  Have a great season all and enjoy time with your families and safe travel to all  John C
arent sturgeon illegal to target? also the ice should be quite safe everywhere by mid jan.
I dont want to catch or target them - i was told they were in this lake - i cannot believe this is correct and if they were  it would be an independant strain worth saving

I heard that from a disreputable truck driver 3 yrs ago as well. I just chocked it up to Bull from a guy who has been on the road all day with no one to talk to jumping in on the conversation. Said he knew a guy (don't we all) that caught one north of Big Island in Pigeon lake.
